item.title: Hobbies... uhh.. geek
item.description: Well, i have grown up and now i have a job and all sorts of responsibilities(hehe). I also got a hobby. I am a tinkerer, a gadgeteer, a hacker. Hehe. That is also a synynom for dork. I recently have been setting up my new web server, and hacking the audrey and doing all sorts of geeky stuff. I have been collecting computers like the plague and trying to make my room the most wired device in the world.
